doc-ca9aaa2084f8c42fdf3e800db762baf6.content: Amazon is an American multinational technology company which focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. It is one of the Big Five companies in the U.S. information technology industry, along with Google, Apple, Microsoft, and Facebook. Amazon was founded by Jeff Bezos from his garage in Bellevue, Washington, on July 5, 1994.
